comprehensive_overview: PRRTE (Proactive Resilience and Real-Time Executor) is a fault tolerance framework designed to provide fault tolerance capabilities to complex, high-performance computing (HPC) applications. It focuses on enabling applications to run to completion in the presence of faults by providing various resilience strategies.
core_features:
1. Proactive resilience management
2. Real-time fault detection and recovery
3. Hierarchical checkpointing mechanisms
4. Dynamic process restructuring
5. Monitoring and reporting of application health
